name: Puck Monster
description:
* NOW SUPPORTS iCade Controller! *


Eat all the dots in the maze to clear the level.

Avoid being eaten by the red monsters that roam the maze, or you will lose one of your 3 lives.

Eat a flashing power pill, for a boost of energy, to be able to chase the monsters.

Monsters flash and only have one eye while you are able to eat them.

Earn big points by eating successive monsters with the same power pill.

But watch out, eaten monsters will regenerate with vengeance on their minds!

Eat or be eaten!!
